text: Hot Steel is a 1940 American film directed by Christy Cabanne and starring Richard Arlen, Andy Devine, and Peggy Moran. ==Cast== *Richard Arlen as Frank Stewart *Andy Devine as Matt Morrison *Peggy Moran as Babe Morrison *Anne Nagel as Rita Martin *Donald Briggs as George Barnes *Joe Besser as Siggie Landers *James Flavin as Storm Swenson Category:1940 films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:1940 drama films Category:American black-and-white films
title: Hot Steel
